description.value:
This viscous, milky-white substance can form a permanent bond between any two objects. It must be stored in a jar or flask that has been coated inside with oil of slipperiness. When found, a container contains [[/r 1d6 + 1]] ounces.

One ounce of the glue can cover a 1-foot square surface. The glue takes 1 minute to set. Once it has done so, the bond it creates can be broken only by the application of universal solvent or oil of etherealness, or with a @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.TB5mhD1xitrWMfX6]{wish} spell.
